participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is hardworking and dedicated, with a nurturing side that comes from his love for his cats.
participant_1.background: i am a construction worker. i've 5cats. my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know.

participant_2.background: i love to drink fancy tea. i have a big library at home. i'm a museum tour guide. i'm partly deaf.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
